titleStmt.title: One sheet, or, If you will a winding sheet for the good old cause in order to a decent funerall, in case of a second death / by W.P., philopolites.
titleStmt.author: W. P.
Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Wrongly attributed to William Prynne--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
